title: October 10th, 2020
content: I get married with my wife.

title: October, 2020
content: One paper is accepted by ACM IMWUT (UbiComp 2021).

title: October, 2020
content: Two Papers are accepted by IEEE ICDE 2021.

title: October, 2020
content: One Paper is accepted by ACM TIST.

title: September, 2020
content: I present our paper FairCharging at ACM UbiComp 2020.

content: One Paper is accepted by IEEE/RSJ IROS'20.

content: One Paper is conditionally accepted by ACM MobiCom'20.

title: April, 2020
content: A new paper is accepted by ACM TIST. If you are interested in electric taxi-related research, you can refer to this paper, from which you may understand the basic mobility and charging patterns of electric taxis.

title: January, 2020
content: A new paper is accepted by WWW 2020.

title: January, 2020
content: A new paper is accepted by ACM IMWUT (UbiComp 2020).

title: November, 2019
content: I present our poster paper tCharge at ACM SenSys 2019 in NYC.

content: I present our poster paper at ACM MobiCom 2019 in Los Cabos, Mexico.

title: October, 2019
content: I present our paper ePat at ACM MobiCom 2019 in Los Cabos, Mexico.

content: One paper is accepted by Measurement.

content: I present our paper sharedCharging at ACM UbiComp 2019 in London.

content: Two poster papers are accepted by ACM MobiCom and ACM SenSys, respectively.

content: A new paper is accepted by ACM IMWUT (UbiComp 2019).
